scripts.test:hotel: npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1; node rename-report.js
scripts.test:hotel:headless: cross-env HEADLESS=true npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1; node rename-report.js
scripts.test:hotel:headed: cross-env HEADLESS=false npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1; node rename-report.js
scripts.test:lambdatest: cross-env USE_LAMBDATEST=true npx playwright test; node rename-report.js
scripts.test:hotel:lambdatest: cross-env USE_LAMBDATEST=true npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1; node rename-report.js
scripts.test:local: cross-env USE_LAMBDATEST=false npx playwright test; node rename-report.js
scripts.test:hotel:local: cross-env USE_LAMBDATEST=false npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1; node rename-report.js
